synopsis.text: Lilia Rainworth steals the heart of Crown Prince Cedric Jeanne Elmir, leaving Aileen Lauren Dautriche, the Duke's daughter, in a dire predicament. This shocking revelation triggers Aileen's memories of her past life, revealing she has been reincarnated as the villainess in an otome game. With her fate sealed for a tragic demise, Aileen must outwit destiny by capturing the heart of the game's final boss, Claude Jeanne Elmir, the Demon King and Cedric's half-brother. In a race against time, Aileen must win Claude's trust and help him establish peace between humans and demonic beasts to rewrite their intertwined fates and avoid her impending doom. Can Aileen successfully seduce the Demon King and secure her happily ever after? The thrilling journey of love, deception, and redemption unfolds in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
